posts.title: Gut Health Remedy Fail
posts.body: My mom taught me to drink sparkling water instead of ginger ale growing up for my stomach issues, but it still tastes awful. Anyone else have 'helpful' remedies that didn't work?

posts.title: Morning Flare-Up Struggle
posts.body: This morning was rough for me. Spent two hours in the bathroom trying to get myself together. Those long flare days can feel so lonely at times.

posts.title: Breaking the Poop Taboo
posts.body: Can we normalize talking about digestive health on social media? Our bowel movements matter and silence helps no one get proper treatment.

posts.title: Peppermint Tea Relief
posts.body: Pro tip: Start your day with peppermint tea to calm the gut naturally. I recommend it to 90% of my IBS clients! #IBSrelief #HolisticHealth

posts.title: Spoonie Win: Cooked a Meal!
posts.body: Had a good pain day today! Managed to cook a healthy anti-inflammatory meal ðŸ¥— Small wins matter with chronic illness. #SpoonieWin

posts.title: PT Session Success
posts.body: Just finished my physical therapy exercises. It's tough but I know it's helping my mobility long-term. Chronic illness warriors - what PT tips help you? ðŸ’ª

posts.title: Compression Gloves Help
posts.body: Struggling with fatigue today, but my new compression gloves are helping with the joint pain. Anyone else find these helpful for autoimmune conditions?

posts.title: Medication Side Effects
posts.body: My new medication is giving me some side effects. Would love to hear others' experiences with hydroxychloroquine for autoimmune treatment.

posts.title: Flare-Up Self Care Kit
posts.body: Created a flare-up self-care kit today with heat pads, my favorite tea, and pain relief cream. What's in your flare kit? Share your must-haves!

posts.title: Heating Pad Savior
posts.body: My heating pad is my best friend during these cold flares ðŸ”¥ Who else relies on heat therapy for pain management?
